duties_responsibilities.duty: Creating email templates and landing pages using HTML coding
Adjusting ecommerce website using HTML coding, e.g. copy, pricing, enhancements
Diagnose obstacles or issues that may arise within the digital marketing systems
Assist with email, ecommerce and landing page reporting
Managing email and landing page schedules and delivery dates
Ensuring compliance with branding guidelines and content across all efforts

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in marketing, communications, business or technology (Master's preferred)
